item.title: Technology
item.description: I’m generally interested in technology, especially but not exclusively digital technologies. I started by writing a blog about systems, software and technology but the problem with blogs is that posts on general issues get lost amongst shorter-term ephemera. I’ve now given up on blogging although I still sometimes comment on technology on Twitter (@iansommerville). The articles here are a selection from my previous technology blog posts plus (very) occasional new articles on technology topics.

item.title: Understanding the Cloud
item.description: An introduction to the Cloud for people who donâ€™t care how it works but want to know how it might be useful for them. There are basically two ways in which computers are used: Personal computers which are used by one person (or sometimes a family) and which can store data, run applications and so on. Shared computers where the computer is shared by a number of different people and which, usually, provide quite specific services.
